New Records: Canada secured their first win at a T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Canada won by 12 runs after Ireland failed to reach the target of 138
Nicholas Kirton scored 49 runs, the highest score for Canada
Jeremy Gordon and Dillon Heyliger took crucial wickets for Ireland
Pre-Game Insights: Canada were expected to perform well despite being the lowest-ranked side
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's players expressed pride in their historic victory
Ireland's lack of adaptability was highlighted by the commentators
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was a significant win for Canada in their World Cup campaign
The match was notable for Ireland's early exit from the tournament
